meta.name: Edit Images with Text Prompts using Bytedance Seededit 3.0 via Replicate API

assignments.name: prompt
assignments.value: A beautiful landscape with mountains and a lake at sunset

assignments.name: response
assignments.value: ={{ { success: true, image_url: $json.output, prediction_id: $json.id, status: $json.status, message: 'Image generated successfully' } }}

assignments.name: response
assignments.value: ={{ { success: false, error: $json.error || 'Image generation failed', prediction_id: $json.id, status: $json.status, message: 'Failed to generate image' } }}

parameters.content:
=======================================
        SEEDEDIT-3.0 GENERATOR
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

## ü§ñ **BYTEDANCE/SEEDEDIT-3.0 - IMAGE GENERATION WORKFLOW**

**üî• Powered by Replicate API and n8n Automation**

---

### üìù **Model Overview**

- **Owner**: bytedance
- **Model**: seededit-3.0
- **Type**: Image Generation
- **API Endpoint**: https://api.replicate.com/v1/predictions

**üéØ What This Model Does:**
Text-guided image editing model that preserves original details while making targeted modifications like lighting changes, object removal, and style conversion

---

### üìã **Parameter Reference**

**üî¥ Required Parameters:** prompt, image
**üîµ Optional Parameters:** seed, guidance_scale

**üìñ Detailed Parameter Guide:**
- **seed** (integer): Random seed. Set for reproducible generation
- **image** (string): Input image to edit
- **prompt** (string): Text prompt for image generation
- **guidance_scale** (number): Prompt adherence. Higher = more literal. (Default: 5.5)

---

### üîß **Workflow Components Explained**

**üéØ Manual Trigger**
- Starts the workflow execution
- Click to begin image generation process

**üîê Set API Token** 
- Configures your Replicate API authentication
- Replace 'YOUR_REPLICATE_API_TOKEN' with your actual token
- Essential for accessing the bytedance/seededit-3.0 model

**‚öôÔ∏è Set Image Parameters**
- Configures all input parameters for the model
- Includes both required and optional parameters
- Pre-filled with sensible defaults for testing

**üöÄ Create Image Prediction**
- Sends the generation request to Replicate API
- Uses the image parameters you configured
- Returns a prediction ID for status tracking

**‚è≥ Wait & Status Checking Loop**
- Waits 5 seconds then checks prediction status
- Continues checking until completion or failure
- Implements intelligent retry logic with 10-second delays

**‚úÖ Success/Error Handling**
- Routes successful completions to success response
- Handles failures gracefully with error details
- Returns structured JSON response with URLs/errors

**üìä Logging & Monitoring**
- Logs all requests for debugging and monitoring
- Tracks timestamps and prediction IDs
- Helps identify issues during development

---

### üåü **Key Benefits**

- **üé® Instant Image Generation**: Transform ideas into images using state-of-the-art AI
- **üîÑ Automated Workflow**: Handles the complete generation pipeline automatically
- **üõ°Ô∏è Error Resilience**: Built-in retry logic and comprehensive error handling
- **üìà Production Ready**: Includes logging, monitoring, and structured responses
- **üîß Customizable**: Easy to modify parameters and extend functionality
- **‚ö° Efficient Processing**: Optimized API calls with intelligent status checking

---

### üöÄ **Quick Start Instructions**

1. **üîë Get Your API Key**
   - Sign up at https://replicate.com
   - Navigate to your account settings
   - Copy your API token

2. **üîß Configure the Workflow**
   - Replace 'YOUR_REPLICATE_API_TOKEN' with your actual token
   - Adjust parameters in the 'Set Image Parameters' node
   - Customize the prompt or other inputs as needed

3. **‚ñ∂Ô∏è Execute the Workflow**
   - Click the 'Manual Trigger' to start
   - Monitor the execution in the n8n interface
   - Check logs for detailed execution information

4. **üì• Get Your Results**
   - Successful generations return a URL to your image
   - Download or use the generated content as needed
   - Results are available immediately upon completion

---

### üîç **Troubleshooting Guide**

**Common Issues:**
- **Invalid API Token**: Ensure your Replicate token is valid and has sufficient credits
- **Parameter Validation**: Check that required parameters match expected types
- **Generation Timeout**: Some images take longer - monitor the logs
- **Output Format**: Verify the model returns the expected output format

**Best Practices:**
- Test with default parameters first
- Monitor your Replicate usage and billing
- Keep API tokens secure and never commit them to code
- Use appropriate parameter values for your use case

---

**üîó Additional Resources:**
- Model Documentation: https://replicate.com/bytedance/seededit-3.0
- Replicate API Docs: https://replicate.com/docs
- n8n Documentation: https://docs.n8n.io

---
